com.defaultpackage.server

Class ServerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.defaultpackage.server.ServerConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerConnection
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class represents a client-server connection. It is the stream through which the client and the server communicate.
    Since:
    07.04.2018
    Author:
    Dushan Terzikj 30001357, Dragi Kamov 30001478, Fanlin Wang 30000522, Sajit Kunwar 20331648

    • Method Detail

      • listFiles

        public void listFiles()
        This method is invoked when the client tpyes the command 'index' It lists the files in server's directory and prints them on the client's screen

      • sendFileToClient

        public void sendFileToClient(java.io.File file)
        This is a helper method which copies a content of some file and sends the content to the client, which is then printed on his screen.
        Parameters:
        file - the file which is being sent to the client

      • sendFiles

        public void sendFiles(java.lang.String filename)
        This method is invoked when the client sends 'get' command. It searches for a file with specific filename and if exists, first it prints "ok" and then the contents of the file. Otherwise, it prints "error" on the clients screen.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file's name
